Package com.controller

Class RoundController

java.lang.Object
com.controller.RoundController
public class RoundController extends Object
The type Round controller. Round controller is the class that contains all methods to supervise a round. It is a singleton.

    • askPlayerForAction

      public void askPlayerForAction(Player player, List<PlayerAction> possibleActions)
      Ask the current player for his next action. This method will call the play method of the current player.
      Parameters:

      possibleActions - the possible actions

    • passToNextPlayer

      private void passToNextPlayer(Player player, Player nextPlayer)
      Pass to next player. If the next player isn't the same player and both players aren't AIs, demand to pass to next player.
      Parameters:
      player - the player currently playing
      nextPlayer - the next player
      See Also:
      • Player
      • ActiveView

    • askPlayersForIdentity

      private void askPlayersForIdentity()
      Ask players for their chosen identity. This method will call the selectIdentity() method to prompt players to choose a role for the round.
      See Also:
      • IdentityCard
      • Player
      • AI
      • ActiveView

    • startRound

      private void startRound()
      Set up the round. This method will do everything necessary to set up a round (select 1st player, create identity cards, distribute Rumour cards, ask players for identity).
      See Also:
      • Round
      • View

    • playRound

      private void playRound()
      Round playing loop. This method will prompt the current player for action, then set the current player to the next and loop while there is more than 1 not revealed player.
      See Also:
      • Player
      • Round

    • endRound

      private void endRound()
      Wrap up the round. This method will do everything necessary to wrap up a round (reveal last player and give him points, gather all cards).
      See Also:
      • GameController
      • Round
      • CardState
      • IdentityCard
      • Deck
      • Player
      • View

    • run

      public void run()
      Run the round.
